Termix-SSH/Termix

Server management platform with SSH terminal and tunneling

View on index

Related repos

  • Terminal emulator and SSH client with SFTP file management
  • cross-platform SSH client with tabs, SFTP, VNC, and session management
  • Share and control terminals from a browser with end-to-end encryption
  • web-based collaborative terminal for sharing sessions
  • Runs GUI applications in the terminal over SSH
  • Terminal SSH manager for server fleets
